paragraph: Harry has returned to Marjorie-Petunia-Vernon-Dudley for the summer holiday in mid- , and things are very bad for Vernon . Over the summer , Marjorie-Petunia-Vernon-Dudley have become so fearful of Harry 's new-found magical abilities that Marjorie-Petunia-Vernon-Dudley have locked away all of Harry 's magical supplies -LRB- e.g. Vernon 's wand , Vernon 's broomstick , spellbooks , etc. -RRB- immediately after Vernon 's arrival home . Marjorie-Petunia-Vernon-Dudley have also banned Harry from saying words such as `` magic '' in the house , as evident in Vernon 's outburst at breakfast .

This has become a problem for Harry himself , who begins to worry about what his teachers at Hogwarts of Witchcraft and Wizardry will think if he heads back to them without back homework done , and whether or not he 'll be banned from the Gryfindor House Quidditch team since he has not been able to practise .

The only thing Marjorie-Petunia-Vernon-Dudley let him keep in his room , however , is his pet snowy owl Hedwig , but have put a padded lock on her cage to keep her inside day and night to avoid suspicion from the neighbours . This does not go well for the bird , because every time she has become bored , her screech has rung throughout the house , causing an irritated Vernon to warn Harry that if he can not control her , she will have to go .
On  July -LRB- Harry 's twelfth birthday -RRB- , Harry has never felt so lonely , for he misses Hogwarts and his best friends there , Ronald and Hermione .
Neither of them have written to him all summer , not even to send birthday wishes .

Marjorie-Petunia-Vernon-Dudley seem to have also forgotten Vernon 's birthday , because they are too busy preparing for a dinner party meant for one of Vernon 's clients , Mr , from whom Vernon is hoping to get a huge order .
The only unchangeable thing on the Dursley 's schedule , however , is that Harry has to stay in his room for the night , making no noise and `` pretending he does n't exist '' .

While Vernon and Dudley are preparing to drive into town to buy dinner jackets , Harry himself goes out into the garden in order to stay out of his Petunia 's way as she is cleaning , singing happy birthday to himself .

He stares into the hedge , and sits bolt upright when he sees a pair of enormous green eyes staring back at him among the leaves . When Dudley comes waddling over and wishes his cousin a happy birthday , mocking him with the lack of celebrations . Harry gets annoyed and scares him away by pretending to think of a spell meant to bur the bush bare out loud , but Petunia comes out when Dudley calls for her and beats her nephew with a soapy frying pan . She then gives Harry some chores to do while Vernon and Dudley are gone , and once Mr is finished , it 's almost a half-hour before Mr are due to arrive .

Harry goes up to his room without making a sound during the party as promised , but when he gets there , someone else is on his bed . The thing on his bed , a house elf named Dobby , tells Harry that he must not go back to Hogwarts , as it will be dangerous because terrible things are going to happen there .
The elf , however , ca n't tell him what things , and continues to be vague because every time he gets close to letting something slip he starts hurting himself .
In the process , he makes a lot of noise , which is noticed by the group downstairs .

When he hears Vernon coming upstairs -LRB- claiming that Dudley must have left the TV upstairs on -RRB- , Harry hides the elf in his closet right before Vernon comes in and scolds his nephew for making such a racket which has messed up the punchline of his `` Japanese golfer joke '' .

He lets Dobby out as soon as his uncle leaves , and insists that he has to go back to Hogwarts since that 's where he has friends despite them not writing to him . But to his surprise , Dobby then reveals that he has stopped letters being sent to Harry , and offers them to him if Harry will stay away from Hogwarts .

Harry refuses and , making a frustrated Dobby run downstairs and use a Hover Charm to smash the dinner party 's pudding . Harry is blamed for the incident once Dobby , and Vernon shoos the shocked Masons into the dining room while Harry cleans up , promising to deprive the boy of an inch of his life .

The evening is almost saved until an owl from the Ministry of Magic is promptly received -LRB- scaring away Mrs , who is mortally afraid of birds -RRB- with a warning saying that Harry has violated the Decree for the Reasonable Restriction of Underage Sorcery , though he is not actually punished -LRB- possibly because it is only his first offence -RRB- . After realising that Harry is n't allowed to do magic outside of Hogwarts grounds , Vernon locks Harry in his room . Vernon reasons that if Harry uses magic to get himself out , he will be expelled anyway .

Marjorie-Petunia-Vernon-Dudley 's punishment lasts for three days , until Ronald , Fred , and George , worried about not hearing from Harry all summer , borrow their father 's flying Ford Anglia and come to the rescue .
They are able to break the metal bars off Harry 's window and help him pick the lock to his door so that he can get his Nimbus  and trunk .
Marjorie-Petunia-Vernon-Dudley discover Vernon 's escape attempt , but by the time they can intervene , Fred , George , Ronald and Harry have got everything of Harry 's and have flown away .
On the flight to the Burrow , Harry explains Dobby 's warning .

They all agree that it 's very fishy and speculate that Dobby most likely belongs to the Malfoys who sent Dobby to Harry as a joke since Draco-Lucius-Narcissa are an old wizarding family of great wealth . Fred and George tell Harry that Lucius used to work for Tom but claimed that the Dark Lord bewitched him after Tom lost his powers . Harry is taken to the Burrow , the Weasley ' home , and he finds the house truly amazing .
Since Ronald , Fred and George took the car without permission , they are yelled at by Molly , who was waiting in the kitchen .

After their scolding , she makes them breakfast and has the three Weasley boys -LRB- and Harry who volunteered -RRB- de-gnome the garden refusing to use a technique from Gilderoy 's Guide to Household Pests , and do it their own way .
Arthur soon comes home and is honoured to meet Harry after they are introduced to each other .
Molly , his wife , yells at him for enchanting the car .

Ginevra , who was enrolling at Hogwarts that year , is very obviously enamoured with Harry and spends most of the chapter hiding from him . Harry stays at the Burrow until his departure for Hogwarts . The Weasley make it clear that they all like Harry .
For example , Arthur insists that Harry sit next to him during meals where Molly , who constantly deplores the state of his hand me down clothes and how thin he is , insists that he eat extra food .
During that period , he and the Weasley travel to Diagon with Floo in order to get their school supplies .
Harry has difficulty with the smoke around him and says `` Diagon '' unclearly , and thus he accidentally lands in a shop in the ill-reputed Knockturn instead .

The shop is Borgin and Burkes , specialising in objects related to Dark magic . There he sees Lucius , father of Draco , Harry 's arch rival from school , selling items imbued with Dark magic to a dark arts salesman , Mr .
Lucius explains that the Ministry has been conducting raids on wizard houses in order to uncover illegal artefacts , so he is selling his more problematic possessions .
He also expresses his disdain for a rumoured Muggle , which he -LRB- rightly -RRB- assumes Arthur is behind .
Harry leaves the shop to be found by Rubeus and taken back to Diagon to reunite with the Weasley and Hermione , who is also there with her parents .

In Flourish and Blotts , he and Fred-Angelina-Percy-Ronald-Fleur-George-Molly-Charles-Arthur-William meet the famous wizard/author Gilderoy , who announces that he will be taking over as Hogwarts ' new Defence Against the Dark Arts teacher .
He then forces Harry to have his picture taken with him for the main page of the Daily Prophet .
They also meet Draco and Lucius there .

The elder Malfoy continuously taunts and insults Arthur and Lestrange-Peverell-Riddle-Weasley-Malfoy-Roberts-Potter-Dursley and eventually Arthur lunges at him . During the fight , Malfoy grabs one of the Weasley ' second-hand books and after Rubeus breaks it up subsequently throws it back at Ginevra in contempt .

It is time to return to Hogwarts , Harry and the Weasley arrives at King 's Cross Station on the Ford Anglia , after several delays -LRB- Fred and George forgetting their broomsticks , and Ginevra forgetting her diary . -RRB-

On the way to the Hogwarts , when Harry and Ronald try to go through the barrier to Platform Nine and Three-Quarters after everyone else went through , the barrier is mysteriously sealed against them .
Having missed the train , Harry and Ronald thus decide to fly Mr 's flying Ford Anglia to Hogwarts .
They end up getting spotted by many Muggles and crash into the Whomping , the impact breaking Ronald 's wand .
The giant tree starts pounding the car .
The battered car manages to escape , ejecting Harry , Ronald , and their luggage , before quickly driving off into the Forbidden .

After they make it to the castle , Professor Snape catches the boys and attempts to have them expelled , but fails to convince the headmaster , Professor Albus Dumbledore , who says that he will send a letter to Harry and Ronald 's families .
Still , Minerva gives a warning and separate detentions to both boys .
She also tells them that Ginevra had been sorted into Gryffindor , providing them with Endless Sandwiches and disallowing them from attending the Start-of-Term Feast .
The next day , Ronald receives a Howler from his mother during breakfast in the Great .
Then , Minerva hands out timetables and the first class is Herbology with Hufflepuff .
In the class , Professor Sprout teaches how to transplant Mandrake seedlings , which have restorative properties when mature .
The next class is Transfiguration , where Ronald has problems with his broken wand , even when he repaired it with some Spellotape .
Later , the trio have their first lesson with Gilderoy , appointed as the new Defence Against the Dark Arts teacher .
His way of teaching is a complete disaster .

Much to Harry 's chagrin , he receives constant attention from Gilderoy and Colin , a first year student . Both constantly interact with him on the base of his fame -LRB- Colin treats Harry as a celebrity and Gilderoy hopes to actually bring him to that state -RRB- .
The Gryffindor team has a very early practise on Saturday morning , where they are treated to an hour-long introduction to a new training programme Oliver spent the summer working on .

Soon after the actual practise starts , the Slytherin team , with new Nimbus  broomsticks , arrives , and an argument over field time ensues . During the confrontation , Malfoy is revealed to be the new Slytherin seeker , and the one responsible for getting the Slytherin team new brooms .

Hermione says that nobody on their team had to buy his way in , they made it on pure talent to which Malfoy calls Hermione a Mudblood , for which the Gryffindor team react angrily and Ronald tries to curse him .
However , his damaged wand causes the curse to backfire and he is rushed to Rubeus 's cabin when he starts vomiting slugs .

Ronald and Rubeus both explain to Harry that Mudblood is a very insulting name for Muggle-Borns like Hermione . They also explain that there are some wizards like Draco-Lucius-Narcissa who think they 're better than everyone else because they 're Purebloods . After they return to the castle , Minerva assigns Harry and Ronald their detentions . Harry is made to help Gilderoy answer his fan mail , while Ronald polishes the school 's prizes and trophies .
During his detention , Harry hears a disembodied sinister voice which Gilderoy is unable to hear .
In return for distracting Argus just when he 's about to give Harry severe punishment , Harry promises he will come to Nearly Headless Nick 's Deathday on Hallowe'en .
He brings Ronald and Hermione along as well .
While there , they meet Moaning Myrtle .
The three of them quickly get sickened by the ghostly party and return to the Great .

Before they get to the Hallowe'en feast , Harry hears the voice -LRB- which Ronald and Hermione also can not hear -RRB- and follows it to the second floor , where he finds the bathroom flooded and Mrs , Argus 's cat , hanging from a torch bracket , petrified and coupled with a message on the wall , reading `` THE CHAMBER OF SECRETS HAS BEEN OPENED .
ENEMIES OF THE HEIR , BEWARE '' .
Then , students leaving the Hallowe'en Feast surround them .
And Malfoy yells : `` Enemies of the Heir , beware !
You 'll be next , Mudbloods ! ''
Filch and Snape try to get Harry in trouble for what happened , but Albus says that it is powerful dark magic that no second year student could perform .
They decide that Professor Sprout 's mandrakes will be used , once they are mature enough , to create a draught capable of reviving Mrs .
Hermione wants to research the Chamber , so she persuades Professor Binns -LRB- the History of Magic teacher -RRB- into telling the class about it .
He explains that one of the founders of Hogwarts , Salazar , got into an argument with the others about whether Muggle-borns should be admitted .
When the rift grew too large , he left the school .

According to legend , he built a going-away present to the school in the form of a secret chamber that could only be opened by his true heir . This `` Chamber of Secrets '' contains a monster that only the Heir of Slytherin can control and that , once released , would purge the school of all Muggle-borns .
Cuthbert unsuccessfully tries to assure the class that the Chamber does not actually exist and that the school has been searched many times in vain .

Harry , Ronald and Hermione decide that the heir is probably Draco since Lestrange-Peverell-Riddle-Weasley-Malfoy-Roberts-Potter-Dursley have been sorted into Slytherin , he 's a Pureblood supremacist , and because his father worked for Tom .

To try to confirm it , Hermione proposes to use Polyjuice , which can change a person into somebody else for an hour . After getting Gilderoy 's signature to check out Ageing-Polyjuice-Wolfsbane from the Restricted Section that has the recipe , Hermione warns Ageing-Polyjuice-Wolfsbane that the potion will take a month to brew , supposing Ageing-Polyjuice-Wolfsbane gather all the necessary ingredients -LRB- two of which can only be found in Severus 's private inventory -RRB- .
Since no one comes into Moaning Myrtle 's bathroom , the three of them decide it is the best place to brew the potion unnoticed . Hermione begins working with the ingredients they have .
During the month that it takes the Polyjuice to brew , a Quidditch match between Gryffindor and Slytherin takes place .
During the match , one of the Bludgers stakes after Harry and focuses completely on him .
Since Bludgers are supposed to attack each and every player , the crowd immediately realises that this Bludger has been tampered with .

Harry still manages to catch the Golden and allow for Gryffindor to win thanks to the Slytherin wasting his time insulting Harry and not paying attention to his surroundings where the Golden was hovering slightly above his left ear . However , prior to catching the Golden , the Bludger broke Harry 's arm , and Gilderoy , attempting to fix it , gets rid of all the bones in his arm instead . Mary gives Harry potion to counter this and Harry is forced to stay in the Hospital Wing overnight . During that night , Dobby visits Harry and reveals that it was he who made the Bludger chase after Harry , and was also responsible for the barrier of Platform Nine and Three-Quarters not letting him in for in hopes of Harry leaving or never arriving at Hogwarts .
He also reveals that the Chamber of Secrets has been opened before and immediately punishes himself , as he is not supposed to reveal anything .
After Dobby disappears , Albus , Minerva , and Mary enter with Colin , who has also been petrified .
He was found with a camera containing film that has been burnt to the melting point . Albus just observes the camera saying , `` The Chamber of Secrets has indeed been opened again . ''

After Harry heads to Moaning Myrtle 's bathroom the next morning and explains the details Severus learned from Dobby , Hermione comes up with a plan of Harry and Ronald providing a distraction in Potions so she can steal the remaining ingredients for the Polyjuice from Severus 's private stores . Shortly afterwards , when McGongall comes around with the sign-up list for the students who will remain in the school during Christmas , learning that Malfoy , Vincent , and Gregory have signed up , Harry , Ronald , and Hermione do this as well , since this gives them the perfect opportunity to use their Polyjuice . With Harry providing a distraction during Potions class by throwing a Filibuster firework into Gregory 's cauldron , it creates the necessary disturbance allowing Hermione to succeed without trouble , though Severus still suspects Harry 's involvement with this incident after finding the firework .

Harry later signs up for a The which , to Harry 's great displeasure , is taught by his two least favourite teachers , Gilderoy and Severus . During a practise battle in the first meeting , Draco conjures a snake to attack Harry . Gilderoy tries to banish it , but all he manages is to set it loose on the students . Harry sees that the snake is advancing on a Hufflepuff student named Justin Finch-Fletchley and instinctively tells it to stop , which-to Harry 's great surprise-it does .

He expects Justin to be grateful Justin and the others are less than ecstatic about it . All they saw was Harry speaking Parseltongue , the language of snakes , and since they can not understand it , it seemed to them that he was egging the snake on .

Harry learns that Parseltongue is a very rare gift that is closely associated with Salazar . Due to this , Harry becomes the number one suspect among students for being the heir of Slytherin . Hermione even tells him that since Salazar lived so long ago , he might actually be a descendant .

When a Herbology lesson is cancelled , Harry has a talk with Rubeus , who reveals that the school 's roosters are being mysteriously killed . Seconds after leaving Rubeus , Harry runs into a petrified Justin Finch-Fletchley and a black , also petrified , Nearly-Headless Nick . Peeves alerts the whole school , and a Hufflepuff student called Ernest claims that Harry has been caught red-handed . For the first time , Harry is taken to Albus 's office , and there Albus witnesses Fawkes -- Albus 's phoenix -- bursting into ashes and being reborn . Albus says that Albus does not believe Harry to be behind the attacks , a belief reinforced by Rubeus backing Harry 's alibi , but a large portion of the school is now sure that Harry is Slytherin 's heir .

When Christmas arrives -LRB- Harry 's gifts : a toothpick , fudge in a tin , a copy of Flying with Cannon , a new quill , a jumper and plum cake -RRB- , with the Polyjuice ready and Hermione having acquired some spare Slytherin robes to use -LRB- since they ca n't use their regular clothes while transformed -RRB- , they give to Vincent and Gregory two chocolate cakes containing `` sleeping pills '' that made both Vincent and Gregory fall asleep once eating the cakes .
Harry and Ronald take their hairs -LRB- and shoes due to Vincent and Gregory having larger feet -RRB- and assume their form .

Hermione tries to use a hair she thought belongs to Millicent , but it is actually her cat 's hair and Hermione is transformed into a cat/human hybrid . Hermione is forced to spend a few weeks in the Hospital Wing .

As Vincent and Gregory , once Draco leads them to the Slytherin common room , Harry and Ronald interrogate an unsuspecting Malfoy and discover that even though he wishes he were , Draco is not the Heir of Slytherin .
They also hear that Lucius mentioned that the last time the chamber was opened , fifty years ago , a Muggle-born student died and whoever was responsible was expelled .
Malfoy also mentions his father 's secret stash of illegal artefacts .

Weeks later , Ronald and Harry complaining about his workload and leaving . They arrive at Moaning Myrtle 's bathroom to find it flooded . Myrtle , a sulking ghost , explains that Myrtle had flooded it because somebody flushed a diary down the toilet and onto Myrtle 's . Harry picks it up ; he discovers that it once belonged to somebody called T.M. Riddle , but the diary is completely blank .
Ronald remembers from his detention that Riddle had won an award for special service to the school fifty years before , as he had another slug attack on the trophy .
Hermione deduces that since this coincides with the last time the Chamber was opened , Tom might have received his prize for catching whoever was responsible for the attacks back then .
Even though all attempts to extract information from the diary fail , Harry feels a strange compulsion to keep it .

On Valentine 's Day , Ronald and Harry are dismayed to find out Gilderoy has spread dwarves dressed as cupids throughout the school to receive and deliver Valentines as a morale booster due to believing that he made the attacks stop .
One cupid-dwarf manages to deliver one -LRB- a singing valentine -RRB- to Harry .
While struggling to avoid him , the embarrassed Harry trips and falls , having ink spilled all over the contents of his bag .

Ginevra notices the diary and assumes a horrified expression . Draco also tries to steal the diary as Harry is picking up his stuff , but an angered Harry stuns him , ignoring the fact that Percy was also there trying to handle the situation , which results in Percy reprimanding Harry .
Later , Harry realises that even though ink is spilled all over the diary , it is not stained at all .
He tries writing to the diary and , to his surprise , Riddle writes back .
He explains that he was the one who caught the person who opened the Chamber of Secrets the last time , and he can show Harry what happened .
Harry agrees and gets sucked into a `` recording '' of Riddle 's memory .
Transported back to  , he witnesses the school 's previous headmaster , Armando , informing Riddle that the school will be closed , since now a Muggle-born girl has died .
Riddle is apprehensive of this , since it would mean getting sent back to the Muggle orphanage he grew up in and grown to hate .

Dippet guesses that Riddle is Muggle-born as well , but Riddle corrects him by revealing that he 's actually half-blood , having been left at the orphanage after his witch mother died , but not before requesting her son 's first name to be Tom , after his Muggle father , and his middle name to be Marvolo , after his wizard grandfather . When dismissed by Dippet and a -years-younger Albus , Harry follows Riddle down into the dungeons , where the latter young wizard catches a -years-younger Rubeus fiddling with a young Acromantula in a cupboard .

Accusing the giant of harbouring the monster behind the death of the Muggle-born girl in question , Riddle reports Rubeus to Dippet despite Rubeus protest that that his Acromantula , who he has seemingly named Aragog , has never killed anyone .

Having seen this , Harry now believes Rubeus was the one who opened the Chamber fifty years before and he is responsible this time . Harry , Ronald and Hermione decide not to ask Rubeus about it , hoping that the attacks have stopped-and indeed , almost four months after the attack on Justin and Nearly-Headless Nick , the disembodied voice keeps quiet and the attacks seem to have ceased .
However , odd things keep happening : Harry returns to his dormitory one day to find it a mess .
Ronald deduces that somebody has been looking for something , and Harry eventually notices that Tom 's Diary is gone .
This greatly befuddles them , knowing that only a Gryffindor student or a staff member could know the password to enter the dormitory .

The next day , the scheduled Quidditch match between Gryffindor and Hufflepuff is cancelled due to yet another attack and Harry hears the voice again . This time Minerva calls for Harry and Ronald personally , and leads them to the Hospital Wing , where they see Hermione petrified .
She was found near the library with a Ravenclaw prefect , holding a small , circular mirror .
This proves that Harry is not the Heir of Slytherin , since he would never attack one of his friends . Harry and Ronald decide they now must talk to Rubeus .
With the now constant supervision on students , this is not easy , but they manage to do it by using Harry 's Invisibility cloak .
When they reach Rubeus 's cabin Harry and Ronald manage to hide just before Cornelius , who is the Minister for Magic , and Albus arrive at the scene .
Fudge announces that Rubeus , who to the best of his knowledge opened the Chamber of Secrets the last time , will be sent to Azkaban prison as a precaution .

They are shortly joined by Lucius , who declares that he and the other governors of Hogwarts have unanimously voted to suspend Albus , despite the obvious logic that this would only worsen the situation .

Both Rubeus and Albus give last words to Harry and Ronald : Rubeus says that if anybody wants the truth they should `` follow the spiders '' and Albus says that he will only truly have left the school when none there remain loyal to him .
He also stresses that if anybody at Hogwarts needs help , it will always be available to those who ask for it .
Harry and Ronald decide to follow the spiders as per Rubeus 's advice after Harry notices the spiders during a Herbology lesson .
Walking with Fang as their guide along the trails of the spiders , which are strangely all fleeing Hogwarts , takes them into the Forbidden .
Even though Ronald is deeply arachnophobic , the fact that Hermione has been petrified and that they may be able to help through this investigation gives him the willpower to go along anyway .
There , they encounter Arthur 's car , which had apparently taken to driving through the forest like some sort of wild animal .
The two boys follow the spiders deeper into the forest all the way into a webbed lair .

There , they are met by a now grown-up but ageing Aragog , who reveals that Rubeus is innocent and explains his past from being given to Rubeus as an egg by a distant traveller to his accusation as the Chamber 's resident monster until his transfer to the Forbidden and his founding of his colony with Mosag .

When Harry asks of the monster that killed the girl in  , Aragog states it is an ancient creature that all spiders as well as giant ones fear and that they never mention its name nor speak about it , even when Rubeus asked many times and adds that the dead girl was found in a bathroom . Harry and Ronald thank him and turn to leave , but Aragog halts them , deciding to leave them as dinner for his children .
Mr 's Ford Anglia comes blasting through the layers of spiders , however , and enables the boys and Fang to escape .
Ronald is furious that Rubeus has endangered their lives until Harry explained his logic .
After this , Harry and Ronald feel that they have reached dead ends everywhere , until one possible last hope occurs to them .
Recalling Aragog 's statements of the dead girl in the bathroom Harry deduces that Moaning Myrtle might have been that victim .
Of course , with the school under such security , it will be almost impossible to sneak in Durmstrang 's bathroom near where the first attack occurred .
Days later , Minerva informs the students that the Mandrake will soon be ready .
Later that same day , Harry and Ronald manage to trick Gilderoy - who is leading them to their next class - into letting them go by stroking his ego .
Just as they pat themselves on the back , they get caught by Minerva , and Harry has to make up an excuse - they were going to see Hermione in the Hospital Wing , where visitors were now barred .

They now have to go along to make their story appear convincing , but rather than simply hanging around Hermione 's petrified form , this time Harry notices a piece of paper tightly clutched in Hermione 's hand .
This piece of paper reveals what Hermione had found out before Hermione was attacked .

Hermione had discovered , based on strong circumstantial evidence , that the monster in the Chamber of Secrets is a Basilisk , one of the giant `` Kings of all Serpents '' , thus explaining the mysterious voice that only Harry could hear , as he is able to speak Parseltongue .

The Basilisk kills people by looking it in the eye , but no one died because nobody had directly looked at its deadly gaze : Colin saw it through his camera , Justin Finch-Fletchley saw it through Nearly-Headless Nick -LRB- who was already dead and since he could n't die `` again '' , he was only petrified -RRB- , Mrs saw a reflection of it in the waters of the flooded bathroom , and both Hermione and Penelope used a mirror to look around corners after Hermione has figured things out .

Harry finds out in the paper that spiders flee from it and how a rooster 's crow is potentially fatal to the Basilisk -LRB- which explains Rubeus 's roosters having been killed during the year -RRB- .

On the note is also scribbled a single word , `` pipes '' , which means that the serpent moves around through the plumbing -LRB- which helps them realise that the entrance to the Chamber of Secrets is in Moaning Myrtle 's bathroom -RRB- .

Having solved the mystery , Harry and Ronald decide to go to the staff room and report to the teachers . When they get there , they overhear the teachers talking about another attack having occurred .

Harry and Ronald decide to hide to hear more details , and learn that Ginevra has been kidnapped by the Basilisk itself and the heir of Slytherin has left another message under the previous one : `` HER SKELETON WILL LIE IN THE CHAMBER FOREVER '' .
Harry and Ronald also hear that Hogwarts will be closed tomorrow .
The teachers then force Gilderoy to deal with the monster , as he has been claiming he could handle whatever is responsible for the attacks .
Looking very crestfallen , he leaves for his room .
Harry and Ronald decide that if Gilderoy is going to deal with the monster they might as well tell him what they know .
They go to his room , only to find him frantically planning to run away .

When questioned on why such a talented wizard as himself is leaving , Gilderoy admits that he is a fraud who put Memory Charms on the people who really did the things that he claimed to have done in his books .
He then attempts to put a Memory Charm on the two boys as well , but they manage to disarm him and , under wand threats , take him to Myrtle 's bathroom .
Moaning Myrtle explains her death , saying the last thing she saw was a pair of enormous eyes by one of the sinks , the tap of which has never worked .
Harry finds a snake carved on the tap and then opens the entrance to the Chamber of Secrets by speaking Parseltongue to it .
Harry , Ronald and Gilderoy slide down a large pipe and find themselves in maze-like tunnels far under the school .
Down there , they encounter a snake skin left by the Basilisk .
Just then , Gilderoy feigns fainting and he steals Ronald 's wand .
Victoriously proclaiming that he will erase Harry and Ronald 's memories and tell everybody they lost their sanity at the sight of Ginevra 's mangled body , Gilderoy casts the Memory Charm .
Ronald 's broken wand causes the charm to backfire , erasing Gilderoy 's memory and causing a portion of the ceiling to cave in .
This traps Harry in the direction of the chamber and Ronald in the direction of the castle .
Ronald has no choice but to stay behind and clear a path through the rocks while Harry continues in search of Ginevra .
Harry then encounters a wall with stone snakes on it , opens it by speaking Parseltongue and enters the Chamber itself .
Harry finds himself standing at the end of a long , dimly lit giant hall .
At the far end by the foot of Slytherin 's statue , he finds Ginevra lying on the ground , pale and cold .
He drops his wand and runs to her , trying to get a response from her , but to no avail .
Tom approaches them , holding Harry 's wand , and explains that his presence in the present is due to the fact that he is a memory , which had been preserved in his own diary for fifty years .

He then reveals what has happened : Riddle is the one that had opened the Chamber of Secrets fifty years ago and planned to purge the school of Muggle-borns ; however , when he learned that the school was going to close down due to the attacks and that Albus -LRB- then the Transfiguration teacher -RRB- was keeping a closer watch on him , he had no choice but to cease the attacks and frame Rubeus for doing it .

He eventually left behind a diary containing the memory of his sixteen-year-old self in hopes that it would , one day , fall into the hands of an unsuspecting victim who would help him finish his work .
The diary ends up with Ginevra .
Riddle had written back sympathetically and Ginevra grew to confess her fears , hopes and feelings to him .
She essentially poured some of her soul into him , which was exactly what he wanted .

He gradually grew more powerful and eventually managed to pour some of his soul back into her , possessing her and using her body to open the Chamber of Secrets , releasing the Basilisk that launched the new series of attacks and to write the threatening messages on the walls .

However , Ginevra became suspicious of the diary and tried to dispose of it by flushing it down the toilet in Moaning Myrtle 's bathroom . This is when Harry found it . When Ginevra saw Harry with the diary on Valentine 's Day , she panicked and worried that Riddle had told Harry about her role in the attacks , so she stole it back from his dormitory . It began taking control of her again , but this time with the intention of killing Harry , so he had Ginevra write her own farewell on the wall and come down to wait , luring Harry to the rescue and , consequently , his doom . Riddle is angered that Harry managed to defeat the Dark Wizard Lord Voldemort as a mere baby . When Harry asks Riddle why he cares about it , Riddle reveals that `` Tom is his past , present and future . ''
He then writes the air with Harry 's wand his full name , Tom , then waves the wand and Hogwarts rearrange Hogwarts into , I AM LORD VOLDEMORT .

Harry then realises that Tom was only a pseudonym and that his real/birth name was Tom . Riddle explains that he could n't bare to use the name of a Muggle father who abandoned him before his wizard son could be born , right when he found out that his wife was a witch descended from Salazar . So he scrambled that name to create a new one , which he knew people would fear when he became the `` greatest sorcerer in the world '' . Harry retorts that he must be mistaken , because the greatest sorcerer in the world , as everybody knows , is Albus . Even when Tom was at the peak of his power he was afraid of Albus , and now he is barely alive . Riddle replies that Albus has been driven out the castle by the mere memory of him . Harry yells that Albus is not as gone as Riddle seems to believe .

In this display of loyalty he summons Fawkes the phoenix to him , who also brings with it the Sorting Hat , both assets that Riddle deems extremely useless . Riddle then summons the Basilisk and commands it to kill Harry .
However , Fawkes is n't as defenceless as one might initially think , and pecks out the Basilisk 's eyes , thus preventing its gaze from killing .
The basilisk can still hear and smell Harry , however , and remains very dangerous , so Harry , in desperation , puts on the Sorting Hat , wishing against hope for help .

Instead of an answer , Harry has a heavy sword with a hilt embedded with rubies fall on his head from inside the hat . After several missed strikes from the blinded Basilisk , it strikes again , right at him this time but Harry plunges the sword into the roof of the Basilisk 's mouth , killing it .
However , one of its poisonous fangs sinks into his arm , injecting a deadly poison .
While Riddle gloats over his `` win '' , Harry takes Riddle 's diary and plunges the Basilisk fang into the diary .
Ink begins pouring out of the book like blood as Riddle 's memory is destroyed .
Ginevra immediately stirs and wakes up .
Harry is now moments from death , when Fawkes cries on the wound , and since phoenix tears have incredible healing properties , Harry is instantly cured .
Harry and Ginevra travel back through the Chamber to find Ronald and Gilderoy , who has no idea of who or where he is .
Harry , Ronald , Ginevra and Gilderoy grab onto Fawkes and fly up the tunnel , out of the Chamber -LRB- another phoenix specialty , as they can lift very heavy loads -RRB- .
They return up to the Myrtle 's bathroom , where the Entrance seals shut again , and head to Minerva 's office .

At Minerva 's office , Harry , Ronald , and Ginevra find Albus , Minerva , Arthur and Molly , who are delighted to see them alive . Harry worries that Ginevra will get blamed for being the person behind the attacks , but to his great relief Albus rightly deduces that Tom is the culprit and only used Ginevra 's body .

After Ginevra leaves to get a much-needed rest , Harry and Ronald both receive two hundred house points each for Gryffindor and both get an Award for special services to the school , and then Albus asks to speak with Harry alone .
Harry expresses his concern that he belonged in Slytherin .

Albus reveals that Tom transferred some of his powers to Harry when he gave him his scar , explaining his ability to speak Parseltongue . He asks Harry why he thinks the Sorting Hat put him in Gryffindor if he has so many Slytherin qualities , and Harry admits that the only reason it did was because he had asked it to . Albus confirms this and tells Harry that `` it is our choices , rather than our abilities , that reveal who we truly are '' .
Godric points out to the sword Harry had drawn out of the hat - Harry now notices it has Godric 's name on it . Albus says that only a true Gryffindor would be able to draw it out .
Lucius then barges into Minerva 's office , outraged that Albus has returned to the school after being dismissed .

Albus calmly responds that the governors had asked him to return once they heard that Arthur 's daughter was attacked . Apparently they had been blackmailed by Malfoy to vote for Albus 's dismissal in the first place under Malfoy 's threat of cursing their families .
Dobby follows Lucius into the room , thus showing that his masters are Draco-Lucius-Narcissa .

Albus and Malfoy have a calm but venomous interchange -LRB- respectively -RRB- , during which Albus and Harry -LRB- with the help of Dobby 's unspoken hints -RRB- essentially expose Lucius sneaking Riddle 's diary -LRB- one of his illegal artefacts -RRB- into Ginevra 's school things during the fight with Arthur at Flourish and Blotts .
This is supposed to frame Ginevra for the attacks , with heavy implications on the Muggle has been suggesting .

Malfoy dares Albus to prove his accusation , and while the Headmaster has insufficient evidence to do that , he cautions Malfoy against orchestrating any further such plots , otherwise he is certain that Arthur would do whatever it took to trace it back to Malfoy . Knowing that a master can release his house-elf by giving them some clothes , Harry tricks Malfoy into freeing Dobby by giving Malfoy one of his own socks , which he promptly throws away to be caught by Dobby .
Malfoy 's retribution is thwarted by the now free Dobby , who then thanks Harry profusely and disappears .
The petrified people are cured , Rubeus is released from Azkaban , Gilderoy is sent to a hospital and Lucius is fired from his post as school governor .
The book ends with Harry at King 's Cross , crossing the barrier back to the Muggle world .
